name: The Regret
description:
Title : The Regret

Genre: Walking Simulator

Platform: Android

We have been developing our game "The Regret" for the last 7 days in order to protest against the "Rape Culture" in Bangladesh.

It's an android walking simulator where the protagonist walks through "Hell" and witnesses the punishments of the sinners.

Developers: 

Imtiaz Hossain Sabree (Game Designer & Environment Artist)

Mesbah Ur Rahman (Gameplay Programmer & Environment Artist)
